p: The properties of the ayurvedic herb ashwagandha have ‘therapeutic and preventive value’ against COVID-19 infection, researchers of IIT-Delhi have found, in collaboration with Japan’s National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology (AIST). The researchers, led by Professor D. Sundar from the DBT-AIST International Laboratory for Advanced Biomedicine (DAILAB), said their study had been accepted for publication in the Journal of Biomolecular Structure and Dynamics, and was likely to be published soon, according to The Indian Express, Tuesday, 19 May 2020.
